data.title: Dr. Paul C Davis, MD
data.meta_description: Find information about and book an appointment with Dr. Paul C Davis, MD. Specialties: Hospital Medicine.
data.text:
Paul C. Davis, M.D., is a hospital medicine physician with Norton Hospitalists. He earned his medical degree from the University of Louisville School of Medicine, where he also completed his residency in internal medicine. He is board certified in internal medicine.

As a hospitalist, Dr. Davis serves as the attending physician for most patients during their hospital stay. His responsibilities encompass a wide range of medical conditions that may arise during hospitalization. Dr. Davis collaborates with subspecialists to ensure patients receive optimal care. When patients have recovered and are ready for discharge, he oversees the appropriate discharge planning.

Born and raised in Louisville, Dr. Davis has deep ties to the city. He spent his formative years in the Highlands neighborhood and attended St. Xavier High School.
